Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to statewide municipal reciprocal program agreements and the issuance of program bonds
Summary: Authorizes statewide municipal reciprocal program agreements and the issuance of program bonds; authorizes proceeds to be made available to a statewide municipal reciprocal program.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to statewide municipal reciprocal program agreements and the issuance of program bonds
